mapper.sql: ALG_ID, ALG_ARG_ID, ARG_LNM, ARG_PNM, ARG_DATA_TYPE, ARG_DEFLT_VAL, MIN_VAL, MAX_VAL, DISP_ORD, USE_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM WAA_ALG_ARG WHERE ALG_ID = #{algId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY DISP_ORD

-- outlier 탐지 ID별 알고리즘 인수 SELECT A.ALG_ID, A.ALG_ARG_ID, A.ARG_LNM, A.ARG_PNM, A.ARG_DATA_TYPE , CASE WHEN B.ARG_VAL IS NULL THEN A.ARG_DEFLT_VAL ELSE B.ARG_VAL END AS ARG_DEFLT_VAL , A.MIN_VAL, A.MAX_VAL, A.DISP_ORD, A.USE_YN FROM WAA_ALG_ARG A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAD_OTL_ARG B ON B.OTL_DTC_ID = #{otlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.ALG_ARG_ID = A.ALG_ARG_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.ALG_ID = #{otlAlgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY A.DISP_ORD
mapper.insert: insert into WAA_ALG_ARG (ALG_ID, ALG_ARG_ID, ARG_LNM, ARG_PNM, ARG_DATA_TYPE, ARG_DEFLT_VAL, MIN_VAL, MAX_VAL, DISP_ORD, USE_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID ) values (#{algId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algArgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{argLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{argPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{argDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{argDefltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into WAA_ALG_ARG
ALG_ID,
ALG_ARG_ID,
ARG_LNM,
ARG_PNM,
ARG_DATA_TYPE,
ARG_DEFLT_VAL,
MIN_VAL,
MAX_VAL,
DISP_ORD,
USE_YN,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
WRIT_DTM,
WRIT_USER_ID,
#{algId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{algArgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{argLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{argPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{argDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{argDefltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{minVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{maxVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dispOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAA_ALG_ARG
ARG_LNM = #{argLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARG_PNM = #{argPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARG_DATA_TYPE = #{argDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARG_DEFLT_VAL = #{argDefltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MIN_VAL = #{minVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAX_VAL = #{maxVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISP_ORD = #{dispOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USE_YN = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ALG_ID = #{algId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ALG_ARG_ID = #{algArgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAA_ALG_ARG set ARG_LNM = #{argLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARG_PNM = #{argPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARG_DATA_TYPE = #{argDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARG_DEFLT_VAL = #{argDefltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MIN_VAL = #{minVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAX_VAL = #{maxVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISP_ORD = #{dispOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USE_YN = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = IFNULL(OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_DTM = now(), WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ALG_ID = #{algId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ALG_ARG_ID = #{algArgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
